about_the_game:
DESCRIPTION
Estación Pirámides is a first-person psychological horror game, based on the Argentine urban legend of “The Ghost Station”.

PLAYABILITY
You will have to go through the 5 levels of this game, solving the puzzles to find all their endings. Because the puzzles are randomly generated, each game is different from the previous one. So the solution you got in one game will not be useful for the next one.

ENDINGS
The game has 18 different endings, some of which are hidden. So you will have to go through every corner of the different levels to find them all.

HISTORY
You have been working late. You decide you've had enough and you go to the subway to go back home. But something goes wrong, the subway stops at a station that does not appear on the maps and to top it off, the people who were traveling with you are gone. What would you do in this situation? Would you get off at the ghost station? Would you stay on the subway waiting for a miracle? There's only one way to find out...
